thread.title: Expert flipper Jeremy Renner sells own home for nearly quadruple what he paid
thread.title_full: Expert flipper Jeremy Renner sells own home for nearly quadruple what he paid

title: Expert flipper Jeremy Renner sells own home for nearly quadruple what he paid
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 24, 2015, 18:46 BST - UK Markets closed Expert flipper Jeremy Renner sells own home for nearly quadruple what he paid The actor is also an expert renovator. He bought the house -- once owned by Preston Sturges -- six years ago, and had been living there with his wife and daughter until their recent breakup. By Sid Lipsey - Yahoo US Homes | Yahoo Finance UK – 4 hours ago 
Associated Press Photos - People-Jeremy Renner-Divorce Related Content 
"I will never be in the stock market," Renner also told Esquire. "It's just gambling. … By Sid Lipsey 
Jeremy Renner's "Avengers" movie character, Hawkeye, may not have any superpowers — but in the real estate market, Renner is Iron Man, Captain America and Thor rolled into one. His superpower: renovating houses for a Hulk-sized profit. 
Renner's most recent conquest is the sale of his Old Hollywood home, once owned by legendary filmmaker Preston Sturges, for nearly quadruple what he paid for it six years ago. Renner lived there with Sonni Pacheco and their daughter, Ava, but the couple recently (and quite bitterly ) split after less than a year of marriage. 
The actor renovated the house in Los Angeles' Runyon Canyon along with his friend and business partner, Kristoffer Winters, with whom he has flipped about 20 houses and earned millions in profits. This lucrative side business provides Renner a nice bit of extra financial security and even helped keep him afloat during his lean years as a struggling actor. 
His most famous flip, in 2013, was a mansion he'd bought for $7 million (£4.5m) and sold for $24 million (£15m) . Jeremy Renner of "The Avengers" has a real-life superpower: renovating houses for a Hulk-sized profit. His most recent conquest is the sale of his Old Hollywood home -- once owned by legendary ... more Jeremy Renner of "The Avengers" has a real-life superpower: renovating houses for a Hulk-sized profit. His most recent conquest is the sale of his Old Hollywood home -- once owned by legendary filmmaker Preston Sturges -- for nearly quadruple what he paid for it six years ago. Click here to read more about it on Yahoo Homes. 2009: The front of the house is obscured by foliage, so this is a side view of the house as it looked when Renner and Kristoffer Winters, his friend and business partner, bought it for $1,350,000 in a court-ordered sale. It just sold for $4.3 million.   Previous listing Fri, Jul 24, 2015 00:00 BST
